I have pre-ordered two games in my life, and Portal 2 was one of them. Nearly a decade later, we're still playing regularly.

Топчик

If puzzle games are your thing ... in fact even if they aren't, this should be one for you. The genre has produced a number of classic games over the years, but cream, as they say, rises to the top. 

Building on the original Portal, Portal 2 carries the principles of warping between places to new levels. Starting with some simple scenarios, this becomes increasingly complex, while the addition of Stephen Merchant's mad cap narrative as your companion, in my opinion, helps to break up the 'test chamber' routines.

In amongst my personal top 10 games of all time. Simply brilliant.

Couple of years of playing on and off, with 181 hours later in total later.. I can more than safely say that this game is just amazing.

I love this Valve, the Valve making amazing games like this title, and it's honestly a damn shame they don't anymore, with Mods now keeping these games alive. Not like that's bad of course, oh no, the custom test chambers in this game are very creative, really, you'll have loads of fun with them all.

Just wish Valve would make games like this again, because they truly can make awesome games. And if they do begin doing that, I'll happily change this review.

Until then.. Do I recommend this game still? Heck yeah I do, it's worth your time, even today. Good single-player campaign, co-op campaign, the test maker works great. Go out and get this game, really, don't miss out on this one.

Плюсы+ и Минусы- 

 Плюсы+ 

+Игра написана на движке Source (Half life 2) Поэтому физика в Игре прекрасна.

+Порталы работают хорошо.

+Мультиплеер хорош.

+Сюжет очень интересен.

+Шутки реально смешные.

+Дубляж есть.

 Минусы-

-В дубляже есть ошибки.

-В игре есть баги.

Una obra de arte de parte de Valve, sin dudas uno de los mejores juego que haya jugado de esta mítica empresa creadora de los mejores juegos y que en mi opinión este juego no necesita tener una 3era parte para que su fandom siga con mas vida, ya que en si el final es muy concluyente y que solo haya un cliff hanger en lo ultimo del juego seria realmente una descepcción que cambiaran esto con un final.
En conclusión, no requiere de más para seguir siendo una buena saga, tiene graficos excelentes (para la época, jugabilidad increíble y tiene una historia algo básica pero bien planeada
